snippet: Mike Krzyzewski will coach what may be his final international basketball game Sunday, a gold medal rematch between the United States and Spain, and those closest to him will also be in attendance.
abstract: United States men's basketball coach Mike Krzyzewski is preparing his team to face Spain in the gold medal final; it is expected to be his final international basketball game as coach of the American team, and his family will be in attendance.
lead_paragraph: Mike Krzyzewski will coach what may be his final international basketball game Sunday, a gold medal rematch between the United States and Spain, and those closest to him will also be in attendance.

headline.seo: Krzyzewski Nurtures Champions, With Women at His Side
headline.main: Nurturing Champions, With Family at His Side
headline.print_headline: Nurturing Champions, With Family at His Side
